original_text: you built yourself a vaulted chamber and made yourself a lofty place in every square.
korean_text: 너를 위하여 누각을 건축하며 모든 거리에 높은 대를 쌓았도다

sentences.original_text: you built yourself a vaulted chamber
and made yourself a lofty place in every square
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 광장에 너를 위한 높은 곳을 만들었습니다.
